item.description:
Saturday Feb.25th 2012

1pm to 2:30pm Free Six Count Lindy ( East Coast Swing )

No Cost or Obligation ~ Open To All Levels

Follow Up On Last Months Lesson

Will Feature New Moves With Smooth Styling

 

Saturday Feb 25h 2012 - 2:30pm to 4:00 pm

Tandem Charleston $10. Open to all Levels

Tandem-Charleston is also sometimes called Back-Charleston because follower is dancing with her back to the leaders front Follow up On Last Months Lesson ~

Will feature New Easy Moves

All Dance2Swing Events Are Come With Or With-out A Partner. Singles And Couples Always Welcome. Open to all Levels

 

Directions to Global Fitness Center Leominster MA

From 495 N or S, Take Exit 29B to Route 2 West and follow directions below.

From Route 2, either West or East, take Exit 31A. That will put you on North Main Street which is Route 12 going South. Come to the first set of lights. Take a Left onto Hamilton St. for about a half mile. Global Fitness Center will be on your Left up on a
hill. Watch for their sign.

From Worcester: Take I-190 North and merge onto Route 2 West. Follow directions
above.

 

www.dance2swing.com  For Up-Dates or Snow Call

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Free Group Swing Dance Lesson ( East Coast Swing )
